snippet: Ted-Jan Bloemen of Canada shattered the world record in the 10,000 meters in a World Cup speedskating event in Salt Lake City, finishing in 12 minutes 36.30 seconds.
abstract: Ted-Jan Bloemen wins 10,000-meter World Cup speedskating event in record 12:36.30 seconds; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Ted-Jan Bloemen of Canada shattered the world record in the 10,000 meters in a World Cup speedskating event in Salt Lake City, finishing in 12 minutes 36.30 seconds.

headline.main: Two Speedskating Records Fall in Utah
headline.print_headline: Two Speedskating Records Fall in Utah
